summary: Updated .claude/commands/review.md to maintain both ROAD_MAP.md and CHANGE_LOG.md. Added Step 1.7 to load CHANGE_LOG.md for historical context with 30-day entry window and fallback behavior. Added Step 6.6 to update CHANGE_LOG.md with significant review findings using entry worthiness criteria. Updated Step 4 report template, Step 7 commit, and Step 8 output to integrate changelog tracking throughout.

artifacts.summary: Updated with Step 1.7 (changelog loading), Step 6.6 (changelog updates), Changelog Context in Step 4 report, changelog staging in Step 7, and changelog status in Step 8
Implementation summary with phase log for both phases
